targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.999, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(1.0, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))
targets.query: histogram_quantile(1.0, sum(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_bucket[$__rate_interval])) by (le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance))

targets.expr: sum by(le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance)(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_sum[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(le,actor_id,wait_side,job,instance) (rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_count[$__rate_interval]))
targets.query: sum by(le, actor_id, wait_side, job, instance)(rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_sum[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(le,actor_id,wait_side,job,instance) (rate(stream_join_barrier_align_duration_count[$__rate_interval]))
